channel.title: [PI] Making prayer do an anim and gfx
channel.description:
Hello, I thought this would be quite simple but it isn't.
I want to make it so when I click turmoil, it will do the gfx (which i have) and the animation ( which i have).
So I figured simpile enough, and went into clickingbuttons.java
I wrote a code that went something like..
[code]Case 89216: c.gfx100(658); c.startAnimation(720); break;[/code]
Compiled fine...so I logged in and clicked on turmoil, but my character didn't perform the animation and gfx. Why?

item.title: [PI] Making prayer do an anim and gfx
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

do ::idtoggle and make sure you have the right id like ashton said

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Making prayer do an anim and gfx

item.title: [PI] Making prayer do an anim and gfx
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

Make sure you added it into the correct switch statement.

Also make sure you have the correct button id.

When you hover over the button and see a number in the top left corner, that is NOT the correct button id.

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] Making prayer do an anim and gfx
